name: Memes IO
description:
An incredible story of Stickman began a long time ago. At that time in the world was special uneasily.
The wars were permanent.
The battle was never-ending.
There were victories and defeats.
Many years later the history was repeat.
Stickman has uneasy task.

You must constantly exercise to win.


---------------------------------------------
Do and try acrobatic tricks that will help to win.
Think about tactics to make traps.
Win 50 unique levels.
Remember that each new battle is harder than the old one
